title: Starshine
description: First Jove/HBJ edition published November 1977. Collection of stories, Derm Fool (1940); The Haunt (1941); Artnan Process (1941); The World Well Lost (1953); The Pod and the Barrier (1957); How to Kill Aunty (1961). "The World Well Lost" is the first sympathetic portrait of homosexuality in modern SF literature.
author: Theodore Sturgeon
